Name: Captain Clive: Danger From Dione
About the game: Captain Clive: DFD is a top-down AND first person shooter where you defeat waves of aliens while upgrading gear! Tear through progressively harder hordes of aliens, get better guns and armor or build your way to victory. Can you balance your way to the top? LOADS OF ENEMIES With over 50 enemies and 7 bosses, there's never a dull moment. Different enemy types make you rethink your strategy constantly while also progressively getting more difficult. PICK YOUR POISON Dual wield any weapon or work for a better gun overall? With over 70 different guns, you'll get plenty of opportunities to try stuff out. You can even pass off weapons to your robotic sidekick. PLAY TO YOUR STRATEGY Focus on upgrading guns? Sure! Getting hurt too much? Buy some armor. Want a more passive approach? Turrets, traps, and defensive walls can all help. There are tons of choices you can make, and your strategy is your own - how will you choose to play?
